title: 干得漂亮美帝——美国不再将中国列为货币操纵国
contents:
美国不再将中国列为货币操纵国。特朗普政府周一将中国移出了汇率操控国名单，为中方高级官员抵达华盛顿与总统签署第一阶段贸易协定提供了重大让步。财政部周一下午发布了拖延已久的货币报告，自特朗普去年8月将中国列入货币操控国以来首次对该国货币政策进行了分析：报告称被贬值以使出口收益的人民币自9月来一直在升值。

U.S. Says China Is No Longer a Currency Manipulator

The Treasury Department’s removal of the designation provided a major concession to China just days before it is set to sign a trade deal with the United States.

WASHINGTON — The Trump administration formally removed China’s designation as a currency manipulator on Monday, offering a major concession to the Chinese government as senior officials arrived in Washington to sign a trade agreement with President Trump.
